Changelog
=========

1.2 - 2010-07-02
----------------

- Added working "insert pane break" button to Kupu.
  [dunlapm]

- Improve styling for the pane break in all browsers.
  [dunlapm]

1.1 - 2010-06-30
----------------

- Removed locales directory since we don't have any translations
  [dunlapm]

1.0 - 2010-06-25
----------------

- Initial release
